'''Clusterleaf of Cultivation''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Sumeru]].

==Overview==
When Clusterleaves of Cultivation come in contact with {{Dendro}}, they will scatter [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s around to a specific location. These Four-Leaf Sigils will disappear after 24 hours.

Some Clusterleaves of Cultivation come in pairs and connect with each other. Activating one of them triggers both Clusterleaves and scatter Four-Leaf Sigils in a path connecting them.

==Gallery==
<gallery>
Clusterleaf of Cultivation Triggered.png|After Triggered by {{Dendro}}
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* Clusterleaves can be activated using [[Dendrograna]] from [[Auspicious Branch]]es. This can be helpful if the player has no {{Dendro}} character on hand.
